name: 戚務正
objective: 本課程介紹工程與科學相關之主要地球物理方法及應用，包含震測，重力，熱流，及磁力。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來解決工程問題。
schedule:
Week 0:  9/21  logistics, introduction to my research

Week 1:  9/28  FFT, matlab, lab1: AVO_1

Week 2:  10/5  Decon, matlab, lab2: report title due

Week 3: 10/12  seismic reflection: overview; matlab, lab3: AVO_2.2

Week 4: 10/19  report reference due

Week 5: 10/26  seismic reflection: pre-stack: matlab, lab4: velocity analyses

Week 6: 11/02  seismic reflection: post-stack: matlab, lab5: migration 

Week 7: 11/09  mid-term: (install SU in your laptop)  

Week 8: 11/16  seismic stratigraphy1: matlab, report proposal due

Week 9: 11/23  seismic stratigraphy2: matlab, lab6: interpretation

Week 10: 11/30  BSR: gas hydrate: matlab, lab7; BSR and AVO

Week 11: 12/7   SU project: PSDM

Week 12: 12/14  SU project: PSDM

Week 13: 12/21  SU project: PSDM

Week 14: 12/28  SIOSEIS project: isopach map

Week 15: 01/04  SIOSEIS project: Isopach map

Week 16: 01/11  Project presentation 

         1/18   report due
